Html:
Hello.

I was able to run Wabbitemu successfully on my ZTE V967S smartphone with Android 4.2.1, but these days I'm unable to run it. The virtual LCD shows nothing, despite I push the ON and other keys. I even checked the ROMs and reinstalled Wabbitemu, no luck at all.

Please, how to fix it? Ask me any questions or feedback procedure necessary to solve this issue.

Kind regards.

Hello,

I've pushed out a new update for Wabbit that I hope will solve your issue. If it doesn't can you say which type of calc you are trying to emulate?

BuckeyeDude
